description:
Alantsil, the previous Hero, and Granbarza, formerly one of the Four Generals, confront each other. One wrong move could bring them to blows. Meanwhile, Bashbarza’s hatred for Dariel explodes, and he heads off to do something about it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dariel sous une pluie de flammes.
ダリエル, 火の粉を浴びる.
